testcase.title: 001) CI users will see all the new content set under 'View all' options

steps.title: the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I expand "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify "Competitive intelligence" the Accordions in Home page are open
I check 'View All' section is displayed in tile 1 "Competitive Intelligence" accordion
I verify 'View All' links for "Competitive Intelligence" accordion are present
I click on "Broker research" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

substeps.message: User is navigated to Broker Research report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Broker Research" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in Abstract view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "Abstract" view
I click on button 'Table view' on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in Table view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "Table" view
I verify if "Release Date" and "Most Recent"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button is clicked

steps.title: I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel
I click on "Companies" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

substeps.message: User is navigated to Companies report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Companies" on page 'Results'
I verify only "Table" view is available
I verify if "Number of Drugs In Active Development" and "Highest to Lowest"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button is clicked

steps.title: I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel
I click on "Event transcripts" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

substeps.message: User is navigated to Event Transcripts report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Event Transcripts" on page 'Results'

substeps.message: Results page is  displayed in List view

steps.title: Results page is displayed in "List" view
I verify if "Date" and "Most Recent"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button is clicked

steps.title: I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel
I click on "Venture funding" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage

substeps.message: User is navigated to Venture Funding report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Venture Funding" on page 'Results'
I verify only "Table" view is available
I verify if "Last Investment Date in LS" and "Most Recent"is selected in Sort by drop down in result page

substeps.message: Bread crumb button 'Back' button is clicked

steps.title: I click on button 'Back' on breadcrumbs panel
I collapse "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page

testcase.title: 011) CI users(with CTI) will see all the 'View all' options

steps.title: the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I expand "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify "Competitive intelligence" the Accordions in Home page are open
I check 'View All' section is displayed in tile 1 "Competitive Intelligence" accordion
I verify "CT.gov trials" link absent in 'View All' links
I collapse "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I expand "Clinical trials intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I verify 'View All' links for "Clinical Trials Intelligence" accordion are present
I collapse "Clinical trials intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
